directions.text: Cut off top of garlic head exposing all gloves, brush with 1 TB oil and wrap in foil.
In a bowl add 1 TB oil, all spices, and cooked garlic and mash to a paste.
Slice each potato into fourths and spread garlic paste all over them.
Assemble potatoes back together, cover each in 2 tsp oil, sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Wrap potatoes in foil and cook for 1 hour at 425°.
